quote_first:
Leaning in your corner like a candidate for wax
Sidewalk social scientist don’t get no satisfaction from your cigarette
It’s ten to ten and time is running out
Lock up all your memories, get outa here, you know that we can run
Today can last another million years
Today could be the end of me
It’s
quote_last: , and I want to stay alive
author: Blondie

quote_last: , Roquenton was holding his wife’s hand and giving her some last words of advice. On the stroke of midnight, she felt her companion’s hand melt away inside her own.
title: The Man Who Walked Through Walls
author: Marcel Aymé

quote_first: Chigurgh rose and picked up the empty casing off the rug and blew into it and put it in his pocket and looked at his watch. The
quote_time_case: new day was still a minute away
title: No Country for Old Men
author: Cormac McCarthy
